amendment.description: To extend the availability of certain funds appropriated in Public Law 106-554.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3860 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3860 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S4009; text: CR S4009) To extend the availability of certain funds appropriated in Public Law 106-554.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3860 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3860 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Byrd.
